question: 投げ付ける
sourceMnemonic: You know that you're <kanji>throw</kanji>ing something that is <kanji>attach</kanji>ing to something else. How else can you say that? The best way would be to say <vocabulary>to throw against</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>to throw at</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The readings just come from two vocab words you've hopefully seen already: <ja>投げる</ja> and <ja>付ける</ja>. So long as you know the readings for those words, the reading for this word should be no problem for you.
